segments.text: Both our countries are quite small . How would you describe the landscape in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My country is well know for being very flat . There are some hills in the southeast of the country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pretty much . The land rises and falls only a few meters . The southeast , the hills rise to a height of a few hundred meters . There are mountains over 1000 meters high in your country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there are . They are not very big compared with the mountains in other countries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The coast of your country is very varied . The coast of my country is just made up of sandy beaches .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That doesn â€™ t sound too bad . Great for sunbathing ! The coast of my country changes even within a few kilometers . There are cliffs , then sandy beaches . Then rocks . There are lots of caves in the cliffs . There are also many small islands off the coast , but few people lives on them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many lakes and rivers in your country too . We also have many rivers , but only a few lakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also have waterfalls in the mountains . They make the landscapes look very scenic . The landscape has been shapes by millions of years of erosion , especially by water .
segments.speaker: S1
